message.raw:
SimpleTrackedVehiclePlugin: Prevent failed assertion. Do not cherry-pick to newer gazebo versions.

The this->body->GetModel() in plugin destructor was creating a reference to the shared ptr that was
currently being destroyed. That's not a good idea.
